RTML.Project:
Demonstration RTML document.
This project is designed to test the RTML parsing modules.
This document specifies ALL the information that will be required by a Discovery Node to SCORE an observation request.
RTML.Telescope:
The Telescope is defined to specify a telescope to observe with.
There is no need to define the Aperture, FocalLength, FocalRatio etc as the specific Telescope has this data.
If partial Telescope details are defined, whilst the Name is not, then any Telescope satisfying the criteria can be used.
Also, specifying a Telescope renders the Location data redundent.
Both have been completely filled in for completeness.
